name: Mountain Summit Book (for Android)
tagline: The mountain summit book (android) provides an app running on android with the possibility to create a log containing all mountain summit you've been on. Multimedia-style.
body:
> Der beste Bergsteiger ist derjenige, der den meisten Spa√ü hat. (Alex Lowe)

## Welcome to the Mountain Summit Book (for Android) project
This is an ERNI community **internal open source** project

### Features
* Post a new summit log with geolocation
* Add descriptions to your new entry
* (in progress) Add a photo to your new entry
* (planned) Publish your achievement on social media
* (planned) See others achievements
* (planned) See others log entries for the same mountain summit

### Requirements
* Android 2.2 or higher
* Device supporting GPS
* Internet access (to use community features)

### Download our latest release
We want you to love our project. So please feel free to download the latest release. We're looking forward to your feedback.
link

### Help us
![You're welcome to use our software or help us by contributing](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192191/Static/welcome.png)

### Support or Contact
If you have any question regarding our project, don't hesitate to contact the project coach (@abeffa) or one of the main contributors.
![Happy hiking and climbing to all!](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1769053059/twitter.jpg)
